name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.8-30c1f90602b98262208bd538287fb0b1e25de52e "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
